rulings.text: For split cards, the flashback cost you pay is determined by the half you cast

If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.
If an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard already has flashback, you may use either flashback ability to cast it from your graveyard.
You may pay any optional additional costs the spell has, such as kicker costs. You must pay any mandatory additional costs the spell has, such as that of Tormenting Voice.

{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: If one of these lands is your first, second, or third land, it enters the battlefield untapped. If you control three or more other lands, however, it enters the battlefield tapped.

If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands (due to Oblivion Sower or Warp World, perhaps), it doesn’t take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.

text:
Spirebluff Canal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

foreign_names.name: Geborstener Blitz
foreign_names.text:
Bonus {4} (Du kannst zusätzlich {4} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Geborstener Blitz fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls die Bonuskosten von Geborstener Blitz bezahlt wurden, fügt er stattdessen dieser Kreatur oder diesem Spieler 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.name: Estallido de relámpagos
foreign_names.text:
Estímulo {4}. (Puedes pagar {4} adicionales en cuanto lances este hechizo.)
El Estallido de relámpagos hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Si el Estallido de relámpagos fue estimulado, en vez de eso, hace 4 puntos de daño a esa criatura o jugador.

foreign_names.name: Éclair explosif
foreign_names.text:
Kick{4} (Vous pouvez payer {4} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
L'Éclair explosif inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Si l'Éclair explosif a été kické, il inflige 4 blessures à cette créature ou ce joueur à la place.

foreign_names.name: Fulmine Dirompente
foreign_names.text:
Potenziamento {4} (Puoi pagare {4} addizionale quando lanci questa magia.)
Il Fulmine Dirompente infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Se il Fulmine Dirompente è stato potenziato, infligge invece 4 danni a quella creatura o a quel giocatore.

foreign_names.name: 噴出の稲妻
foreign_names.text:
キッカー {4} （あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{4}を支払ってもよい。）
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。噴出の稲妻はそれに２点のダメージを与える。 噴出の稲妻がキッカーされている場合、代わりにそれはそのクリーチャーかプレイヤーに４点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.name: Explodir em Raios
foreign_names.text:
Reforçar {4} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {4} ao conjurar esta mágica.)
Explodir em Raios causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Se Explodir em Raios foi reforçado, em vez disso, ele causa 4 pontos de dano àquela criatura ou àquele jogador.

foreign_names.name: Взрывная Молния
foreign_names.text:
Усилитель {4} (Вы можете заплатить дополнительно {4} при разыгрывании этого заклинания.)
Взрывная Молния наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку. Если Взрывная Молния получила Усилитель, вместо этого она наносит 4 повреждения тому существу или игроку.

foreign_names.name: 闪电迸发
foreign_names.text:
增幅{4} （你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{4}。)
闪电迸发对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。 如果闪电迸发已增幅，则改为它对该生物或牌手造成4点伤害。

name: Burst Lightning
original_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Burst Lightning was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.
text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

foreign_names.name: Siedender Tümpel
foreign_names.text: {T}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, opfere den Siedenden Tümpel: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Insel oder einem Gebirge und bringe die Karte ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.name: Laguna ardiente
foreign_names.text: {T}, pagar 1 vida, sacrificar la Laguna ardiente: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de isla o montaña y ponla en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.name: Lac de montagne bouillant
foreign_names.text: {T}, payez 1 point de vie, sacrifiez le Lac de montagne bouillant : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'île ou de montagne et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.name: Laghetto Bollente
foreign_names.text: {T}, Paga 1 punto vita, Sacrifica il Laghetto Bollente: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Isola o Montagna e mettila sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.name: 沸騰する小湖
foreign_names.text: {T}, ライフを１点支払う, 沸騰する小湖を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから島カードか山カードを１枚探し、それを戦場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.name: Lago Alpino Fervente
foreign_names.text: {T}, Pague 1 ponto de vida, Sacrifique Lago Alpino Fervente: Procure um card de Ilha ou Montanha em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreign_names.name: Обжигающее Горное Озеро
foreign_names.text: {T}, заплатите 1 жизнь, пожертвуйте Обжигающее Горное Озеро: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Острова или Горы и положите ее на поле битвы. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.name: 沸腾山湖
foreign_names.text: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲沸腾山湖：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛或山脉牌，并将之放进战场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

name: Scalding Tarn
original_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

flavor: "There's a hole in your plan." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

foreign_names.flavor: „Dein Plan hat ein Loch." —Noyan Dar, Ruhezauberer aus Tazeem
foreign_names.name: Zauberdurchbohrung
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Nicht-Kreaturenzauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {2} bezahlt.

foreign_names.flavor: "Hay un agujero en tus planes." —Noyan Dar, mago arrullador de Tazeem
foreign_names.name: Horadar el hechizo
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura a menos que su controlador pague {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: « Il y a comme un défaut dans votre plan. » —Noyan Dar, ataraxmage de Tazeem
foreign_names.name: Percesort
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort non-créature ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paye {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: "C'è un buco nel tuo piano." —Noyan Dar, mitigatore di Tazeem
foreign_names.name: Perforamagie
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「お前の計画には穴がある。」 ――タジームの凪魔道士、ノヤン・ダール
foreign_names.name: 呪文貫き
foreign_names.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とする。そのコントローラーが{2}を支払わない限り、それを打ち消す。

foreign_names.flavor: "Há um furo em seu plano." — Noyan Dar, Mago Anulador de Tazeem
foreign_names.name: Perfurar Mágica
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura, a menos que seu controlador pague {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: «В вашем плане есть прокол». — Нойен Дар, маг-баюн из Тазима
foreign_names.name: Прокол Заклинания
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое не являющееся существом заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「你的计划有漏洞。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达
foreign_names.name: 点破咒语
foreign_names.text: 除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击该咒语。

name: Spell Pierce
original_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

name: Flooded Strand
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

foreign_names.name: Geheimnisstöberer
foreign_names.text: Schaue dir zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte offen vorzeigen. Falls auf diese Weise eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexerei-Karte vorgezeigt wird, transformiere den Geheimnisstöberer.

foreign_names.name: Indagador de secretos
foreign_names.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar esa carta. Si se muestra una carta de instantáneo o conjuro de esta manera, transforma al Indagador de secretos.

foreign_names.name: Sondeur de secrets
foreign_names.text: Au début de votre entretien, regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler cette carte. Si une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel est révélée de cette manière, transformez le Sondeur de secrets.

foreign_names.name: Scopritore di Segreti
foreign_names.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelarla. Se una carta istantaneo o stregoneria viene rivelata in questo modo, trasforma lo Scopritore di Segreti.

foreign_names.name: 秘密を掘り下げる者
foreign_names.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。 あなたはそのカードを公開してもよい。 これによりインスタント・カードかソーサリー・カードが公開された場合、秘密を掘り下げる者を変身させる。

foreign_names.name: 신비의 탐구자
foreign_names.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 공개할 수 있다. 이렇게 해서 순간마법이나 집중마법 카드를 공개한다면, 신비의 탐구자를 변신시킨다.

foreign_names.name: Investigador de Segredos
foreign_names.text: No início de sua manutenção, olhe o card do topo do seu grimório. Você pode revelar aquele card. Se um card de mágica instantânea ou de feitiço for revelado dessa maneira, transforme Investigador de Segredos.

foreign_names.name: Разыскиватель Тайн
foreign_names.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать ту карту. Если таким образом показывается карта мгновенного заклинания или волшебства, трансформируйте Разыскивателя Тайн.

foreign_names.name: 掘密师
foreign_names.text: 在你的维持开始时，检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以展示该牌。如果以此法展示出一张瞬间或法术牌，转化掘密师。

foreign_names.name: 掘密師
foreign_names.text: 在你的維持開始時，檢視你的牌庫頂牌。 你可以展示該牌。 如果以此法展示出一張瞬間或巫術牌，轉化掘密師。

name: Delver of Secrets
original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

rulings.text: You may reveal the card even if it’s not an instant or sorcery. Whether or not you reveal it, the card stays on top of your library.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

foreign_names.name: Schnellzauberer
foreign_names.text:
Aufblitzen
Wenn der Schnellzauberer ins Spiel kommt, erhält eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexerei-Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof bis zum Ende des Zuges Rückblende dazu. Die Rückblendekosten sind gleich ihrer Manakosten. (Du kannst jene Karte aus deinem Friedhof für ihre Rückblendekosten wirken.Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)

foreign_names.name: Mago lanzachasquidos
foreign_names.text:
Destello.
Cuando el Mago lanzachasquidos entre al campo de batalla, la carta de instantáneo o conjuro objetivo en tu cementerio gana retrospectiva hasta el final del turno. Su coste de retrospectiva es igual a su coste de maná. (Puedes lanzar esta carta desde tu cementerio pagando su coste de retrospectiva. Luego exíliala.)

foreign_names.name: Mage lancevif
foreign_names.text:
Flash
Quand le Mage lancevif arrive sur le champ de bataille, une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée de votre cimetière acquiert le flashback jusqu'à la fin du tour. Le coût de flashback est égal à son coût de mana. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis votre cimetière pour son coût de flashback. Puis exilez-la.)

foreign_names.name: Mago Lanciorapido
foreign_names.text:
Lampo
Quando il Mago Lanciorapido entra nel campo di battaglia, una carta istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio nel tuo cimitero ha flashback fino alla fine del turno. Il costo di flashback è pari al suo costo di mana. (Puoi lanciare quella carta dal tuo cimitero pagando il suo costo di flashback. Poi esiliala.)

foreign_names.name: 瞬唱の魔道士
foreign_names.text:
瞬速
瞬唱の魔道士が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カード１枚かソーサリー・カード１枚を対象とする。それはターン終了時までフラッシュバックを得る。 フラッシュバック・コストは、それ自身のマナ・コストに等しい。 （あなたはフラッシュバック・コストで、そのカードをあなたの墓地から唱えてもよい。その後、それを追放する。）

foreign_names.name: 찰나의 마도사
foreign_names.text:
섬광찰나의 마도사가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법이나 집중마법 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드는 턴종료까지
회상 능력을 얻는다. 회상 비용은 그 카드의 마나비용과 동일하다. (당신은 그 카드의 회상 비용을 지불해 그 카드를 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다. 그 후, 그 카드를 추방한다.)

foreign_names.name: Mago da Conjuração-relâmpago
foreign_names.text:
Lampejo
Quando Mago da Conjuração-relâmpago entra no campo de batalha, o card de mágica instantânea ou de feitiço alvo no seu cemitério ganha recapitular até o final do turno. O custo de recapitular é igual ao seu custo de mana. (Você pode conjurar este card de seu cemitério pagando seu custo de recapitular. Depois, exile-o.)

foreign_names.name: Маг Молниеносных Заклинаний
foreign_names.text:
Миг
Когда Маг Молниеносных Заклинаний выходит на поле битвы, целевая карта мгновенного заклинания или волшебства на вашем кладбище получает Воспоминание до конца хода. Стоимость Воспоминания равна ее мана-стоимости. (Вы можете разыграть ту карту из вашего кладбища за ее стоимость Воспоминания. Затем изгоните ее.)

foreign_names.name: 迅咒法师
foreign_names.text:
闪现
当迅咒法师进战场时，目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌获得返照异能直到回合结束。 其返照费用等同于该咒语的法术力费用。 （你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

foreign_names.name: 迅咒法師
foreign_names.text:
閃現
當迅咒法師進戰場時，目標在你墳墓場中的瞬間或巫術牌獲得返照異能直到回合結束。 其返照費用等同於該咒語的魔法力費用。 （你可以從你的墳墓場施放該牌，並支付其返照費用，然後將它放逐。）

name: Snapcaster Mage
original_text:
Flash
When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: For split cards, the flashback cost you pay is determined by the half you cast
If you cast a spell from a graveyard using its flashback ability, you can’t pay other alternative costs (such as that of Foil).
If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.
If an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard already has flashback, you may use either flashback ability to cast it from your graveyard.
You may pay any optional additional costs the spell has, such as kicker costs. You must pay any mandatory additional costs the spell has, such as that of Tormenting Voice.

text:
Flash
When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

foreign_names.flavor: 水のキャンバスに、溶岩の絵の具。

foreign_names.text:

{1}, {T}, 焦熱島嶼域を生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.flavor: 물이 있는 곳이 화폭이고 용암은 물감이다.
foreign_names.name: 불타는 작은 섬
foreign_names.text:
{T}, 생명 1점을 지불한다: {U} 또는 {R}를 추가한다.
{1}, {T}, 불타는 작은 섬을 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Onde a água se faz tela e a lava se faz tinta.
foreign_names.name: Ilhota Ardente
foreign_names.text:
{T}, pague 1 ponto de vida: Adicione {U} ou {R}.

foreign_names.name: Пламенный Островок

{T}，支付1點生命：加{U}或{R}。
{1}，{T}，犧牲熾火孤島：抽一張牌。

name: Fiery Islet
original_text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Fiery Islet: Draw a card.
text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Fiery Islet: Draw a card.

flavor: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.

foreign_names.flavor: In jeder Kultur gibt es Unglückszahlen. In einer Stadt, in der man entweder alleine ist, sich in einer Menge befindet oder einen Dolch in den Rücken bekommt, ist die Zwei die schlimmste Zahl.
foreign_names.name: Zauberschlinge
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 2.

foreign_names.flavor: Cada cultura tiene sus números desafortunados. En una ciudad donde estás solo, en una multitud, o siendo apuñalado por la espalda, dos es el peor número de todos.
foreign_names.name: Trampa de hechizos
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo con coste de maná convertido de 2.

foreign_names.flavor: Chaque culture a ses chiffres porte-malheur. Dans une ville où vous êtes seul, dans une foule, ou poignardé dans le dos, deux est le chiffre le plus maléfique.
foreign_names.name: Collet à sorts
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé dont le coût converti de mana est de 2.

foreign_names.flavor: Ogni cultura possiede i propri numeri sfortunati. In una città in cui puoi essere solo, in mezzo a una folla o pugnalato alla schiena, due è il numero peggiore di tutti.

rulings.text: For split cards, the flashback cost you pay is determined by the half you cast
If you cast a spell from a graveyard using its flashback ability, you can’t pay other alternative costs (such as that of Foil).
If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.
If an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard already has flashback, you may use either flashback ability to cast it from your graveyard.
You may pay any optional additional costs the spell has, such as kicker costs. You must pay any mandatory additional costs the spell has, such as that of Tormenting Voice.

name: Nimble Obstructionist
original_text:
Flash
Flying
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Nimble Obstructionist, counter target activated or triggered ability you don't control.

rulings.text: Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability doesn’t resolve (due to being countered with Disallow, for example, or if the triggered ability’s targets have become illegal), the other ability will still resolve.
Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be targeted. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be targeted.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities, such as prowess and afflict, are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggers at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that phase or step occurs.

Mana abilities can’t be targeted. An activated mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool as it resolves, doesn’t have a target, and isn’t a loyalty ability. A triggered mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool and triggers on an activated mana ability.
Activated abilities are written in the form “Cost: Effect.” Some keyword abilities, such as equip and eternalize, are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts.

text:

flavor: "The study of magic began when the first mage taught herself to throw lightning." —Naban, dean of iteration

foreign_names.flavor: „Mit dem ersten erfolgreichen Blitz aus der Hand einer Magierin war das Studium der Magie geboren." —Naban, Dekan der Iteration
foreign_names.name: Blitz des Zauberers
foreign_names.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {2} weniger, falls du einen Zauberer kontrollierst.
Der Blitz des Zauberers fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.flavor: "El estudio de la magia comenzó cuando la primera maga aprendió a lanzar rayos". —Naban, decano de la iteración
foreign_names.name: Rayo del hechicero
foreign_names.text:
Te cuesta {2} menos lanzar este hechizo si controlas un Hechicero.
El Rayo del hechicero hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreign_names.flavor: « L'étude de la magie commença lorsque la première mage apprit par elle-même à lancer des éclairs. » —Naban, doyen de l'itération
foreign_names.name: Éclair de sorcier
foreign_names.text:
Ce sort coûte {2} de moins à lancer si vous contrôlez un sorcier.
L'Éclair de sorcier inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreign_names.flavor: "Lo studio della magia ebbe inizio quando la prima stregona imparò da autodidatta a lanciare fulmini." —Naban, decano dell'iterazione
foreign_names.name: Folgore dello Stregone
foreign_names.text:
Questa magia costa {2} in meno per essere lanciata se controlli un Mago.
La Folgore dello Stregone infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreign_names.flavor: 「魔法の研究は、最初の魔道士が稲妻を放つ方法を見出した時に始まった。」 ――反復の学部長、ナバン
foreign_names.name: 魔術師の稲妻
foreign_names.text:
あなたがウィザードをコントロールしているなら、この呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}少なくなる。
クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。魔術師の稲妻はそれに３点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor: "마법의 연구는 최초의 마법사가 번개를 던지는 법을 스스로 터득했을 때부터 시작되었다." —반복학과 학과장, 나반
foreign_names.name: 마법사의 번개
foreign_names.text:
당신이 마법사를 조종한다면 이 주문은 발동하는 데 {2}가 덜 든다.
원하는 목표를 정한다. 마법사의 번개는 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.flavor: "O estudo da magia começou quando a primeira maga aprendeu a soltar raios sozinha." — Naban, deão das iterações
foreign_names.name: Relâmpago do Mago
foreign_names.text:
Esta mágica custa {2} a menos para ser conjurada se você controla um Mago.
Relâmpago do Mago causa 3 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreign_names.flavor: «Изучение магии началось с того момента, когда первая чародейка научилась творить молнии». — Набан, декан итераций
foreign_names.name: Чародейская Молния
foreign_names.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {2} меньше, если вы контролируете Чародея.
Чародейская Молния наносит 3 повреждения любой цели.

foreign_names.flavor: 「魔法研究起源于第一位自学投掷闪电成功的法师。」 ～迭演院长奈班
foreign_names.name: 法师雷击
foreign_names.text:
如果你操控法术师，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。
法师雷击对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

foreign_names.flavor: 「魔法研究起源於第一位自學投擲閃電成功的法師。」 ～迭演院長奈班
foreign_names.name: 法師雷擊
foreign_names.text:
如果你操控魔法師，則此咒語減少{2}來施放。
法師雷擊對任意一個目標造成3點傷害。

name: Wizard's Lightning
original_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any target.

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re casting Wizard’s Lightning, no player may take other actions until the spell’s been paid for. Notably, players can’t try to raise the spell’s cost by removing your Wizards.

text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any target.

flavor: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

foreign_names.flavor: „Kapitänin Storms Kurs ist leicht vorauszusehen, denn sie wählt immer die gefährlichere Route."
foreign_names.name: Optionen
foreign_names.text:
Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreign_names.flavor: "Es fácil anticipar las órdenes de la capitana Tempestad: ¡solo tienes que tomar la ruta más peligrosa!".
foreign_names.name: Optar
foreign_names.text:
Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)
Roba una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: « Il n'y rien de plus simple que d'anticiper les ordres de la capitaine Tempeste : suivre le cap le plus dangereux. »
foreign_names.name: Option
foreign_names.text:
Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)
Piochez une carte.

foreign_names.flavor: "È facile prevedere gli ordini della Capitana Fendiburrasca: basta tracciare la rotta più pericolosa."
foreign_names.name: Opzione
foreign_names.text:
Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)
Pesca una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: 「風雲船長の命令は予想がつくな。『危険な方の航路を取れ』だよ。」
foreign_names.name: 選択
foreign_names.text:
占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
カードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.flavor: "스톰 선장의 명령은 예측하기 쉬워. 더 위험한 쪽으로 가지."
foreign_names.name: 선택
foreign_names.text:
점술 1을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreign_names.flavor: "É fácil prever as ordens da Capitã Tormenta: siga o caminho mais arriscado."
foreign_names.name: Optar
foreign_names.text:
Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)
Compre um card.

foreign_names.flavor: «Предвосхитить приказы капитана Шторм очень просто: выбираем самый опасный маршрут».
foreign_names.name: Выбор
foreign_names.text:
Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)
Возьмите карту.

foreign_names.flavor: 「要预先知晓速腾船长的命令并不难：走更危险的那条航道。」
foreign_names.name: 抉择
foreign_names.text:
占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
抓一张牌。

foreign_names.flavor: 「要預先知曉速騰船長的命令並不難：走更危險的那條航道。」
foreign_names.name: 抉擇
foreign_names.text:
占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
抽一張牌。

name: Opt
original_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.
text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.

flavor: "A fool's fire is quickly quenched." —Shaper Kumena

foreign_names.flavor: „Einem übereilten Zauber ist leicht beizukommen." —Wandler Kumena
foreign_names.name: Zauberdurchbohrung
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, es sei denn, sein Beherrscher bezahlt {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: "El fuego de un necio se apaga fácilmente". —Moldeador Kumena
foreign_names.name: Horadar el hechizo
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura a menos que su controlador pague {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: « Le feu d'un imbécile s'éteint rapidement. » —Modeleur Kumena
foreign_names.name: Percesort
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort non-créature ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: "Il fuoco degli stolti si spegne rapidamente." —Kumena il plasmatore
foreign_names.name: Perforamagie
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「愚者の火などすぐに消える。」 ――形成師のクメーナ
foreign_names.name: 呪文貫き
foreign_names.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{2}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。

foreign_names.flavor: "어리석은 자가 지핀 불은 금방 꺼지지." —변형술사 쿠메나
foreign_names.name: 주문 관통
foreign_names.text: 생물이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {2}를 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreign_names.flavor: "O fogo dos tolos apaga-se rapidamente." — Moldador Kumena
foreign_names.name: Perfurar Mágica
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica alvo que não seja de criatura, a menos que seu controlador pague {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: «Огонь дурака легко затушить». — заклинатель Кумена
foreign_names.name: Прокол Заклинания
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое не являющееся существом заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {2}.

foreign_names.flavor: 「不自量力的火焰转眼即灭。」 ～塑形师库莫那
foreign_names.name: 点破咒语
foreign_names.text: 除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。

foreign_names.flavor: 「不自量力的火焰轉眼即滅。」 ～塑形師庫莫那
foreign_names.name: 點破咒語
foreign_names.text: 除非目標非生物咒語的操控者支付{2}，否則反擊之。

name: Spell Pierce
original_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

flavor: Where dragons once slept, their bones now rest.

foreign_names.flavor: Wo Drachen einst schliefen, ruhen nun ihre Knochen.
foreign_names.name: Gefluteter Strand
foreign_names.text: {T}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, opfere den Gefluteten Strand: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Ebene- oder Insel-Karte und bringe sie ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.flavor: Allá donde en otro tiempo dormían los dragones, ahora descansan sus huesos.
foreign_names.name: Playa anegada
foreign_names.text: {T}, pagar 1 vida, sacrificar la Playa anegada: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de llanura o isla y ponla en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.flavor: Là où les dragons sommeillèrent jadis, leurs os reposent désormais.
foreign_names.name: Grève inondée
foreign_names.text: {T}, payez 1 point de vie, sacrifiez la Grève inondée : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de plaine ou d'île et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.flavor: Dove un tempo dormivano i draghi, ora riposano le loro ossa.
foreign_names.name: Spiaggia Allagata
foreign_names.text: {T}, Paga 1 punto vita, Sacrifica la Spiaggia Allagata: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Pianura o Isola e mettila sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.flavor: かつて龍たちが眠りについた場所には、今では彼らの骨が眠っている。
foreign_names.name: 溢れかえる岸辺
foreign_names.text: {T}, ライフを１点支払う, 溢れかえる岸辺を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから平地・カードか島・カードを１枚探し、それを戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.flavor: 한때 용들이 잠들던 이곳에는 이제 용의 뼈만 잠들어 있다.
foreign_names.name: 물이 넘치는 개울
foreign_names.text: {T}, 생명 1점을 지불한다, 물이 넘치는 개울을 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 들이나 섬 카드 한 장을 찾아 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Onde os dragões um dia dormiram, hoje descansam seus ossos.
foreign_names.name: Praia Inundada
foreign_names.text: {T}, Pague 1 ponto de vida, Sacrifique Praia Inundada: Procure um card de Planície ou Ilha em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreign_names.flavor: Там, где когда-то спали драконы, теперь покоятся их кости.
foreign_names.name: Затопленная Пойма
foreign_names.text: {T}, заплатите 1 жизнь, пожертвуйте Затопленную Пойму: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Равнины или Острова и положите ее на поле битвы. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.flavor: 群龙栖息处，空余骨安眠。
foreign_names.name: 潮没水滨
foreign_names.text: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲潮没水滨：从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原或海岛牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.flavor: 群龍棲息處，空餘骨安眠。
foreign_names.name: 潮沒水濱
foreign_names.text: {T}，支付1點生命，犧牲潮沒水濱：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張平原或海島牌，並將之放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

name: Flooded Strand
original_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

original_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Scalding Tarn
original_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Steam Vents
original_text: As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Steam Vents enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Spell Pierce
original_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

flavor: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.
name: Spell Snare
original_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.
text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.

name: Vendilion Clique
original_text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.
text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

flavor: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

foreign_names.flavor: 火花魔道士は叫び、彼が若かった頃の嵐の怒りを呼び起こそうとした。驚いたことに、空はもう再び見られないと思った恐るべき力で応えた。
foreign_names.name: 稲妻
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。稲妻はそれに３点のダメージを与える。

foreign_names.flavor: 火花法师大叫着，呼唤他年轻时的风暴之怒。令他意外的是：天空用他从未奢望复见的强大能量来回应。
foreign_names.name: 闪电击
foreign_names.text: 闪电击对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。

name: Lightning Bolt
original_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

foreign_names.name: ヴェンディリオン三人衆
foreign_names.text:
瞬速
飛行
ヴェンディリオン三人衆が戦場に出たとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの手札を見る。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選んでもよい。そうしたなら、そのプレイヤーはその選ばれたカードを公開し、それを自分のライブラリーの一番下に置き、その後カードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.name: 薇安留聚群
foreign_names.text:
闪现
飞行
当薇安留聚群进战场时，检视目标牌手的手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。若你如此作，则该牌手展示所选的牌，将该牌置于其牌库底，然后抓一张牌。

Flash
Flying

text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

foreign_names.name: Feenkonklave
foreign_names.text:
Das Feenkonklave kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U}.
{1}{U}: Das Feenkonklave wird zu einer 2/1 blauen Feenwesen-Kreatur mit Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. Es ist immer noch ein Land. (Es kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)

foreign_names.name: Cónclave de hadas
foreign_names.text:
El Cónclave de hadas entra en juego girado.
{T}: Agrega {U} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}{U}: El Cónclave de hadas se convierte en una criatura Hada azul 2/1 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra. (No puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)

foreign_names.name: Conseil des faeries
foreign_names.text:
Le Conseil des faeries arrive en jeu engagé.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} à votre réserve.
{1}{U} : Le Conseil des faeries devient une créature 2/1 bleue Peuple fée avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain. (Il ne peut être bloqué que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)

foreign_names.name: Conclave Fatato
foreign_names.text:
Il Conclave Fatato entra in gioco TAPpato.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}{U}: Il Conclave Fatato diventa una creatura Spiritello 2/1 blu con volare fino alla fine del turno. E' ancora una terra. (Non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)

foreign_names.name: フェアリーの集会場
foreign_names.text:
フェアリーの集会場はタップ状態で場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}を加える。
{1}{U}：フェアリーの集会場は、ターン終了時まで飛行を持つ青の２/１のフェアリー・クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。 （それは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）

foreign_names.name: Conclave Feérico
foreign_names.text:
Conclave Feérico entra em jogo virado.
{T}: Adicione {U} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}{U}: Conclave Feérico torna-se uma criatura azul 2/1 do tipo Fada com a habilidade de voar até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno. (Ela só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)

foreign_names.name: Конклав Фей
foreign_names.text:
Конклав Фей входит в игру повернутым.
{T}: Добавьте {U} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}{U}: Конклав Фей становится существом 2/1 синяя Фея с Полетом до конца хода. При этом он остается землей. (Он может быть заблокирован только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)

name: Faerie Conclave

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

name: Mutavault

rulings.text: Although Mutavault has all creature types while it’s animated, it does not have the changeling keyword ability.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.
Examples of creature types include Sliver, Goblin, and Soldier. Creature types appear after the dash on the type line of creatures.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
